summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for Yacco Health Ghana Healthcare Platform - fixed critical MongoDB ObjectId serialization issues

critical_bugs.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error causing 500 Internal Server Error
critical_bugs.impact: Complete failure of user and facility creation
critical_bugs.solution: Fixed MongoDB operations to prevent ObjectId mutation of response dictionaries

resolved_issues.issue: Multiple find_one operations not excluding _id field
resolved_issues.solution: Added proper _id exclusion in MongoDB queries to prevent serialization conflicts
